stimulusHtml: In the lower left side of the tympanum, the church’s namesake, Saint Foy, is depicted kneeling before the outstretched hand of God in order to

features.html:
The question refers to the image shown.

© Peter Willi / The Bridgeman Art Library

choicesHtml: inspire visiting pilgrims to similarly adopt humble reverence before the hand of God
inform visiting pilgrims of the tragedy of her death and her resulting sainthood
remind visitors that they should approach the altar on their knees
prepare visitors that they should also expect to die as Christian martyrs
